name: Chicken Taco Stew
recipeIngredient: 1 Can Cannellini beans drained and rinsed
1 Can Black beans, canned drained and rinsed
3 Cans (10 oz) each 3 cans diced tomatoes with green chillies
1 Can Sweet corn drained (bread and butter)
3 Skinless, boneless chicken breasts cut lengthwise in half
3 avocados chopped to use as a topping when being served.
